alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 09 at 10:03PM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Shingle Creek At Campbell affecting Osceola County. .Shingle Creek at Campbell is in Minor Flood stage this evening and continues a slow decline. The creek level is forecast to continue to fall to Action Stage on Monday. For the Shingle Creek...including Campbell...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning by 1100 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shingle Creek At Campbell. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 60.0 feet, Ponding up to a foot deep in the Sherwood Forest and Good Samaritan Village areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 60.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM EDT Sunday was 60.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 60.2 feet late this evening. - Flood stage is 60.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (10 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Shingle Creek Campbell 60.0 60.1 Sun 8 pm 59.7 59.2 MSG MSG MSG &&
